doc.previous: where the four numbers are integers For illustration 3 31 and 310 can be represented as the sum of four squares as follows  Lagrange s four square theorem also known as Bachet s conjecture states that every natural number can be represented as the sum of four integer squares
doc.after: This theorem was proven by Joseph Louis Lagrange in 1770
